items.name: Free Style · Creative Portrait
items.title: Free Style – Realistic Couple Portrait
items.description: Create a unique, realistic portrait of a couple in your favorite style. Professional rendering with vibrant detail, perfect for sharing, gifting, or printing as a keepsake.

items.name: Wedding Studio · Classic White Portraits
items.title: Studio Wedding – Classic White Portrait Collection
items.description: Capture timeless elegance with a classic studio-style wedding portrait session. Receive a suite of polished, high-resolution photos with consistent lighting and natural tones—perfect for printing, framing, and sharing your love story in style.

items.name: Neon Night Portrait · Modern Urban
items.title: Anniversary Portrait – Neon Night Style
items.description: Step into the electric glow of the city—vivid neon portraits with unified tones, enhanced skin, and unique nighttime flair. Receive stunning 2K/4K images, perfect for couples seeking a memorable, modern anniversary photo session.

items.name: Our Year Recap · Anniversary Video
items.title: Our Year – 90s Annual Recap Film
items.description: Transform a year’s worth of memories into a vibrant 90-second recap film, automatically sequenced from your highlights. Perfect for couples and families to cherish milestones, anniversaries, and the beauty of everyday living—shareable in full HD.

items.name: Proposal Reel · Vertical Video
items.title: We're Getting Married – Proposal Reel (60–90s Vertical)
items.description: Effortlessly relive your most romantic moment with a personalized 60–90 second vertical proposal video, crafted from your favorite photos and clips. Professionally edited with beat-synced titles and automatic subtitles, perfect for social media, parties, or sharing with loved ones. Keep the excitement and memory of your engagement beautifully alive.

items.name: Anniversary Piano · Personalized Theme
items.title: Anniversary – Piano Adagio (Personal Theme Song)
items.description: Mark your anniversary with a custom piano or ambient theme song, tailored to your story and mood. Enjoy both a full-length and a looped segment—ideal for memories, background audio for videos, or sharing your journey through beautiful music.

items.name: Romantic Outdoor Sunset · Portrait
items.title: Romantic Outdoor – Sunset Portrait
items.description: A romantic outdoor portrait of a couple at sunset, softly lit with natural colors and a scenic background. Perfect for capturing your love in a stunning, cinematic moment.

items.name: First Dance Folk · Custom Love Song
items.title: First Dance – Gentle Folk (Bespoke Love Song)
items.description: Celebrate your special day with a one-of-a-kind wedding or proposal song, thoughtfully generated from your unique love story—including lyrics, melody, and vocals. Delivered in professional audio quality, this personalized track ensures an unforgettable first dance and a meaningful keepsake for years to come.
